lt4:nrccMessages.lt:message: Major disruption to Thameslink services. Trains may be cancelled, revised or delayed by up to 20 minutes. Latest information can be found in Status and Disruptions.
Trains running through Purley Oaks may be cancelled. Latest information can be found in Status and Disruptions.

lt8:service.lt4:delayReason: This train has been delayed by a fault with the signalling system
